text:
Hi community, I am new to HubSpot websites.

Can someone help me with the blog listing and pagination issue?
Currently, my blog is displaying 10 posts per page, and the requirement is 12. I tried searching a solution on google but couldnâ€™t find one.

Attaching a screenshot of the code below.
1. blog_listing.module
2. blog_index

Hey <@U06FY4HGSS1> I've also wondered about this once. You actually set the amount of blogs on a listing page in the blog settings. So go to your blog and then click the settings :gear: and you should find the counter there.
Thanks <@U04CC57CMBP>, This works like a charm. You save my day! :raised_hands:
